The Detroit Pistons secured a 118-115 victory over the Portland Trail Blazers.
Anfernee Simons had 36 points and nine assists for Portland, while Shaedon Sharpe had 20 points, eight assists and eight rebounds.
The Pistons advanced to an 18-18 record and achieved their fourth consecutive win.
For the first time since 2018, the Pistons are .500 in January.
Tim Hardaway Jr. added 26 points for Detroit and Jalen Duren had 14 points and 12 rebounds.
